title: Which Companies offer professional app development services? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot of companies out there. And by lots I mean probably over a million worldwide. The categories you’ll find are: Boutique firms - consulting firms of under 100 people that usually specialize in something specificLarge consulting firms - like IBM and Accenture. These guys do really big projects and usually charge top dollar.Independent consultants - depending on the app you need you might be able to get a good independent to do it. Possibly on Upwork or Guru.No-code, low-code firms - These platforms allow you to build your own app without writing code. There are many different kinds and some are better than others for certain things.Hope this helps! My company JumpModel is a boutique firm that specializes in digital solutions in the industrial sector.
